message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I'm confident this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to your business.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,250,000. I believe this price better reflects the value I can get out of the product, and I'm willing to make a deal at this price.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,250,000 is a bit too low for me to consider.  This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will bring you a substantial return on your investment.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,325,000?

I understand that you're looking for a higher price, but I'm still not convinced that $1,325,000 is the right number. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'm proposing $1,312,500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
